name: Dr. Assist: Hospital Management System
intro: A massive VBA application created for a Hospital as a Hospital Management system to run as Multi-user Application connected to a single Database. The process starts from creating receipts --> create admission form --> Printing of both: Receipts and Admission form --> Fetching generated data --> Printing & convert Data to PDF --> Transferring the Patients --> Looking up Patient auto-generated account for all paid and unpaid bills --> Filling Discharge Form and discharging the patient only after all balances are cleared. All data are Backed up automatically when the application was closed at the end of the day.
features: Users can check Payment History of a particular admitted Patient with all the necessary details available in just 1-click.
The patient is discharges only when the Outstanding balance gets 0.
Outstanding Balances are Automatically calculated for all admitted patients.
All Data & Reports are generated Automatically and can be printed or converted to PDFs whenever required.

name: Tales For Life: Hindi Stories Website
intro: Developed a WordPress website and worked on SEO optimisation for a client.
features: Developed a customized WordPress website for publishing Hindi Stories and deployed it on HostGator.
Added HTTPS security using Let’s Encrypt and ensured external resources are delivered securely.
Integrated several APIs & automated tasks to create a better interaction between the users and the webmaster.
Ranked 2nd on Google SERP for the keyword “Weekly Hindi Stories” in just 6 months by focusing only on on-page SEO with a page-load time of under 3 seconds.
Implemented Heat Maps and Advanced Analytics to get users Data and worked upon decreasing Bounce Rates and generated Leads by giving free eBooks.
